description.english: Win one round
description.german: Gewinnen Sie eine Runde
description.italian: Vinci un round
description.russian: Выиграть один раунд
description.brazilian: Ganhe uma rodada

description.english: Spend 50,000 scraps.
description.german: 50.000 Schrott ausgeben.
description.italian: Spendi 50.000 scarti.
description.russian: Потратьте 50 000 клочков.
description.brazilian: Gaste 50.000 restos.

description.english: Use 1,000 in energy
description.german: Verwenden Sie 1.000 Energie
description.italian: Usa 1.000 in energia
description.russian: Используйте 1000 в энергии
description.brazilian: Use 1.000 em energia

description.english: Play the game for one hour
description.german: Spielen Sie das Spiel für eine Stunde
description.italian: Gioca per un'ora
description.russian: Играть в игру в течение одного часа
description.brazilian: Jogue o jogo por uma hora

displayName.english: I played the game a little more
displayName.german: Ich habe das Spiel ein bisschen mehr gespielt
displayName.italian: Ho giocato un po 'di più il gioco

description.english: Play the game for five hour
description.german: Spielen Sie das Spiel für fünf Stunden
description.italian: Gioca per cinque ore

displayName.english: I played the game for ten hours
displayName.german: Ich habe das Spiel zehn Stunden lang gespielt
displayName.italian: Ho giocato il gioco per dieci ore
displayName.russian: Я играл в игру десять часов
displayName.brazilian: Eu joguei o jogo por dez horas

displayName.english: I played the game for a long time

description.english: Play the game for fifteen hour

displayName.english: I played the game more than you
